title: How To Introduce A New Hen To The Hen House

tasks.task: Introducing a new hen to the hen house
subtasks: Place new hen in a large wire dog crate
Position the crate in the chicken run where existing hens can see it
Monitor the hens' behavior towards the crate for 3 days
Open the crate door when the hens have lost interest
Consider using a dark environment to introduce the hen if preferred
Allow the new hen to choose when to exit the crate

tasks.task: Introducing a new rooster to the flock
subtasks: Place the new rooster in a wire dog crate
Position the crate near the existing hens to allow visibility
Allow hens to acclimate to the rooster's presence over time
Use a fence or barrier to facilitate gradual integration
Provide safe supervision when introducing the rooster to the flock
Understand the water intake calculation (half their body weight in ounces)
Monitor daily water consumption to maintain proper hydration
Adjust water availability as needed to meet chickens' requirements
